科学家确认多巴胺与认知灵活性之间的神经化学联系根据《核医学杂志》上发表的新研究，科学家首次证实了多巴胺与认知灵活性之间的神经化学联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/scientists-confirm-neurobiobiochemical-rink------------------------------- and-nink-news-neurobiochemical-link-bet-bet-bete-between-dopamine and-dopamine and-cognitive-cognitive-flexibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/scientists-confirm-neurobiocimiochemical-link-link-bet------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d3174d3-Edc4-4820-9ac7-239d56ccfb05 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 14:05:42 -0400 Scientists confirm neurobiochemical link between dopamine and cognitive flexibility
鼻腔灌洗的材料为评估COPD提供了基础COPD的早期诊断，慢性阻塞性肺部疾病会增加患者的生活质量和可用治疗的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/protein-in-the-the-nose-provides-information-information-about-copd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/protein-in-the-the-nose-provides-information-information-about-copd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74DC6831-B1CC-45D0-B47A-2791A2BE935C Fri, 28 Mar 2025 13:55:00 -0400 Material from nasal lavage provides a basis for assessing COPD
与乳腺癌耐药性有关的肿瘤中的脂质积累发表在《免疫力》杂志上的一项新研究揭示了一种机制，该机制允许三重阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）发展对治疗的抗性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/lipid-accumulation-in-tumors-linked-to-therapy-therapy-consistance-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/lipid-accumulation-in-tumors-linked-to-therapy-therapy-comisistance-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8774C9D4-536B-437C-9D25-CC44F52222D603 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 13:23:05 -0400 Lipid accumulation in tumors linked to therapy resistance in breast cancer
研究发现24小时空腹周期增强了雄性小鼠的性欲24小时周期的长期禁食通过降低脑中神经递质5-羟色胺的浓度来增加雄性小鼠的性欲。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/study-finds-24-hour-finds-fasting-cycles-enhance-enhance-libido-in-male-in-male-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/study-finds-24-hour-finds-fasting-cycles-enhance-enhance-libido-in-male-in-male-mice-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb078Ed3-6997-48E6-AC05-454B53ADFA14 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 13:14:12 -0400 Study finds 24-hour fasting cycles enhance libido in male mice
科学家开发了研究TDP-43在神经退行性中积累的实验室模型称为TDP-43的蛋白质的积累是ALS和额颞痴呆的关键特征。在一项新发表的研究中，研究人员报告说，通过实验室中产生的罪魁祸首的碎片“播种”了这种积累。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/scientists-develop-lavel-lab-model-to-study-tdp-43-accumulation-in-neurodegeneration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/scientists-develop-laveloveling-lab-model-to-study-tdp-43-accumulation-in-neurodegeneration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d621899c-52c5-4dbf-a1ac-171414140db574 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 12:54:04 -0400 Scientists develop lab model to study TDP-43 accumulation in neurodegeneration
发现歧视暴露会增加焦虑，种族和种族的抑郁症风险一项新的研究发现，美国超过一半的成年人遇到了某种形式的歧视，这种虐待可能会由于文化，社会和系统性因素而导致特定的种族和族裔群体中抑郁和/或焦虑的机会更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/discrimination-expoulin-found-found-to-raise-to-raise-anxiety-depression-risks-risks-mong-racial-ang-racial-and-nicnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/discrimination-exposure-found-found-to-raise-raise-anxiety-depression-risks-risks-mong-racial-and-racial-and-comnnic-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ccf064b-41b8-4577-b1fb-c6d97f08aca4 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 12:34:05 -0400 Discrimination exposure found to raise anxiety, depression risks among racial and ethnic groups
生长因子鸡尾酒可以逆转炭疽毒素的致命作用炭疽病是由细菌炭疽杆菌引起的一种传染病，通常可以在早期阶段治疗。但是，一旦这种疾病在几天后就超出了“无回报点”的进展，几乎可以肯定的是注定要失败。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/growth-factor-cocktail-could-could-revers-deadly-efflects-of-anthrax-toxin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/growth-factor-cocktail-could-could-could-revers-deadly-effects-of-anthrax-toxin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4032E35E-0672-46DF-852F-B0D8E444581C4 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 12:19:14 -0400 Growth factor cocktail could reverse deadly effects of anthrax toxin
研究提供了冰综合征的全面基因组和表观基因组景观虹膜核内皮（ICE）综合征是一种罕见的，不可逆转的眼睛疾病，具有未知的病因。目前，缺乏有针对性的有效药物，疾病预后不足和外科手术后高复发率是冰的当前挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/research-provides-a-comprehmiss-genomic-and-pepigenomic-landscape-of-cape-oce-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/research-provides-a-comprehens-genomic-and-pepigenomic-and-pemenomic-landscape-of-sic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c8d6e3b-82d4-4adc-904e-Beffdd5cc9d8 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 12:08:00 -0400 Research provides a comprehensive genomic and epigenomic landscape of ICE syndrome
AI驱动的模型改善了膀胱癌治疗结果的预测利用AI和机器学习技术的力量，Weill Cornell Medicine开发了一种更有效的模型，以预测患有肌肉侵入性膀胱癌的患者如何对化学疗法做出反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/ai-powered-model-improves-prediction-of-bladder-cancer-wareatment-ustcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/ai-powered-model-improves-prediction-of-bladder-cancer-cancer-wareatment-ustcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f70c022-df9e-43f4-b255-d5555cf36bf36bf6d0 Fri, 28 Mar 2025 10:18:17 -0400 AI-powered model improves prediction of bladder cancer treatment outcomes
间隔癌症是重大乳腺癌病例在一项新研究中，来自Karolinska Institutet的研究人员表明，在两个筛查会议之间检测到的所谓间隔癌症是乳腺癌病例的很大一部分，并且某些危险因素可能会增加发展此类癌症的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/interval-cancers-cancers-account-for-simporificant-breast-cancer-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250328/interval-cancers-cancers-account-for-simenfificant-breast-cancer-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b8f4667-b9a0-4d19-4d19-81cb-879a87e790cc Fri, 28 Mar 2025 10:10:00 -0400 Interval cancers account for significant breast cancer cases
